translations: 拱背，拱起的背；陡峭的山地

sentences.sentence: Said they saw him out by Hogback Bridge this morning with all sorts of cameras.
sentences.translation: 说是看见他今天早晨在桥那儿，带着各式各样的相机。

sentences.sentence: It was fifteen minutes to Hogback Bridge northwest of town, and he might just get some shots there if he hurried.
sentences.translation: 离镇西的桥有十五分钟的路程，如果他赶快的话还可能在那里照几张照。

sentences.sentence: The cover was his photo of a team pulling a wagon toward Hogback Bridge. He had written the text for the article as well.
sentences.translation: 封面是他照的那一群马拉车走向猪背桥的照片，配图的文章也是他写的。
